snippet: Marlies Schild overtook her younger sister Bernadette to win a World Cup slalom in Courchevel, France. It was her 34th slalom win, tying Vreni Schneider’s record.
abstract: Marlies Schild wins World Cup slalom event in Courchevel, France.
lead_paragraph: Marlies Schild overtook her younger sister Bernadette to win a World Cup slalom in Courchevel, France. It was her 34th slalom win, tying Vreni Schneider’s record.

headline.main: Schild Ties Record With World Cup Slalom Win
